privileges.name: Discovery
privileges.description: This role allows for the discovery of all the connected storage controllers.

privileges.name: Create Storage
privileges.description: This role allows for the creation of volumes and logical unit number (LUNs).

privileges.name: Modify Storage
privileges.description: This role allows for the resizing and deduplicating of storage.

privileges.name: Destroy Storage
privileges.description: This role allows for the destruction of volumes and LUNs.
